title: The troll in champs select
body:
we all have faced this at one point or another if your at low elo you enter champs select and pick your pre ban pick phase champ to let your teammates know what you want to play. when during the pick and ban phase one of those champs is banned by either team. at this point nine out of ten times the individual whose champ was banned reacts in some negative way usually promising to intentionally feed by picking some champ into their role that is at an extreme disadvantage or just doesn't work. while at this point to only options left are to quit and take a leave buster or play the game and take 20 minutes of something that resembles a massacre as this individual feeds everyone on the enemy team. Of course there is the post game report system but it doesn't matter the tribunal system more than likely wont notice this individual to the probably obnoxious numbers of reports or just gives a warning. There is nothing you can do in this case  but its extremely wrong that an individual can troll to such an extend on not face more serious consequences even before the match happens. usually individuals that intentionally feed have done it before and yet they remain and keep doing it. 

I have no idea what riot should do in regards to this growing problem or if im just insane and unlucky to keep getting matched up with these individuals. either way it makes me more and more upset every time it happens and while I don't think ill ever quit league, it has come to the point that some days i don't want to ladder anymore due to this issue.

replies.body: If riot stopped banning toxic players, there would be less in lower levels because all anyone does is smurf anymore. Mainly because their accts are banned. They should start IP banning players/machine banning.

IP banning is impossible (what is this, 1995?).
Banning MAC or other hardware IDs is spoofable. Honestly they should bring back the tribunal, at least just for player reviews (let players flag legit reports for review by staff).

The current mass number of idiot children that report everyone regardless of what they did is what makes it impossible for riot to have staff reviewing every report, sadly. 
There should be feedback if you are falsely reporting, and eventual restriction on ability to report at all.

Do what Dota 2 does. You get 3 reports per week and if the person you reported gets punished(chat ban or low priority) you get refunded one report. That stops 12 years olds form reporting everyone on their team cause they fed and are mad they are garbage at the game.
